title: Tenzies
description: This app is a replic of YouTube, it has the same functionalities. I made it mainly with ReactJS, JavaScript, Sass, Icons, API.

title: YouTune 2.0
description: An app that can conect to an external API to ask for data JSON. I use React with AXIOS library to conect with the API. I used aswnc-await functions.

title: Json Place Holder API
description: This is a personal project build with React, consuming external APIs. The app conects with big food providers to get the data and the user can choose food a liitle bit cheaper.
